document.title: Schneider Electric Modicon M221 PLCs and SoMachine Basic (Update A)

revision_history.summary: ICSA-17-103-02 Schneider Electric Modicon M221 PLCs and SoMachine Basic
ICSA-17-103-02A Schneider Electric Modicon M221 PLCs and SoMachine Basic (Update A)

product.name: All Modicon M221 PLCs with: firmware version up to v1.5.0.1 and associated SoMachine Basic software (up to v1.5)

notes.text: Project files, including user-defined project passwords, are encrypted with a hardcoded password.CVE-2017-7574 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 10.0 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:L).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Schneider Electric recommends that users store project files in secure, access-restricted locations and encrypt project files with reputable third party file encryption tools.

On June 14, 2017, Schneider Electric released firmware v1.5.1.0 and associated SoMachineBasic V1.5SP1. The new version uses an enhanced encryption mechanism and prevents M221 from returning the password.
